attributes.action: To Erect A Statue of Sir Winston Churchill in Scotland
attributes.additional_details: Arguably the greatest Statesman ever to have lived, Scotland should recognize and show her gratitude to Sir Winston Churchill by erecting a statue in his honour.

rejection.details: This request should be submitted to the Scottish Parliament Public Petition website: http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/vli/publicinfo/htsapp/Index.htm
